WorkItem.Description:
Looking at my character in RAWR 2.3.15, I've noticed that my Crit is now being valued at 2.64. This not only seems a little high for my gear level, it's also about double what I'm seeing on the Online Beta version of RAWR. Not sure if this is a bug or if something changed that I wasn't aware of, but it's throwing off the value of any gear or gems I try to Optimize.
Â 
.xml attached

Comments.Message: If I open this character on http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php and check relative stat values I get 2.64 for crit. I'm not sure what you're seeing. Also the value of crit is relatively stable judging from the stats graph. Do you have any evidence why this value would be abnormal?
I found the problem, and it's user error. I had the wrong talent spec entered.
